pages.about-us: About CoolZone - Providing High-Quality Air Conditioning Solutions CoolZone Home About us Conditioner Contact ABOUT COOLZONE Welcome to CoolZone, your premier destination for high-quality air conditioning solutions. At CoolZone, we are dedicated to providing exceptional cooling comfort for homes and businesses alike. Our mission is to offer innovative and energy-efficient air conditioners that enhance your indoor environment. With years of experience in the HVAC industry, CoolZone prides itself on delivering products that combine cutting-edge technology with reliability and affordability. Whether you're looking to cool a single room or an entire building, we have the perfect solution to meet your needs. Customer satisfaction is at the heart of everything we do. Our knowledgeable conditioner is committed to providing expert advice and personalized service, ensuring you find the right air conditioner for your space. We strive to exceed your expectations with every interaction, from purchase to installation and beyond. Discover the CoolZone difference today. Join countless satisfied customers who trust us for their cooling needs. Experience comfort, reliability, and efficiency with CoolZone air conditioners. 100 UNITS SOLD 125 SATISFIED CUSTOMERS 250 CLIENTS DELIGHTED 575 HAPPY CUSTOMERS WHY CHOOSE COOLZONE? Premium Quality Experience superior cooling performance with our high-quality air conditioners crafted from top-grade materials. Energy Efficiency Save on energy bills with our energy-efficient models that maximize cooling while minimizing power consumption. Reliability Trust in CoolZone's reliable products backed by years of expertise and a commitment to delivering lasting performance. Exceptional Service Enjoy personalized service and expert advice from our knowledgeable conditioner to ensure you find the perfect air conditioner for your needs. pages.privacy-policy: CoolZone Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Personal Information CoolZone Home About us Conditioner Contact CoolZone Privacy Policy Introduction Welcome to CoolZone's Privacy Policy. CoolZone respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information when you visit our website (the "Site"), use our services, or interact with us. Information We Collect We may collect and process the following data about you: Personal identification information (e.g., name, email address, phone number) Demographic information (e.g., age, gender, location) Technical data (e.g., IP address, browser type, device type) Usage data (e.g., pages visited, actions taken on the site) Marketing and communication preferences How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect in the following ways: To provide, operate, and maintain our services To improve, personalize, and expand our services To communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries and providing customer support To send you promotional emails and newsletters (you may opt-out at any time) To comply with legal obligations Sharing Your Information We may share your personal information with third parties under certain circumstances: With service providers and business partners who assist us in operating our website and providing our services With legal authorities if required by law or to protect our rights or the rights of others With your consent or at your direction Security of Your Information We are committed to ensuring the security of your personal information. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, misuse, loss, or alteration. Your Rights Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the right to: Access and receive a copy of your personal data Rectify any inaccurate or incomplete information Request the erasure of your personal data under certain conditions Restrict the processing of your personal data Object to the processing of your personal data Withdraw your consent to the processing of your personal data Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. CoolZone website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline CoolZone Legal Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions

pages.terms-conditions: CoolZone Terms and Conditions - Policies and Guidelines CoolZone Home About us Conditioner Contact CoolZone Terms and Conditions Welcome to CoolZone's Terms and Conditions. These terms outline the rules and regulations for the use of CoolZone's website (the "Site") and the purchase of products and services from CoolZone. 1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing this Site or purchasing products or services from CoolZone, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, all applicable laws, and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. 2. Products and Services CoolZone offers air conditioning products and related services through the Site. All purchases are subject to availability and confirmation of the order price. 3. Use License Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on CoolZone's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license, you may not: modify or copy the materials; use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial); attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on CoolZone's website; remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server. 4. Disclaimer The materials on CoolZone's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. CoolZone makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights. 5. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that State or location. 7. Changes to Terms CoolZone may revise these terms of use for its website at any time without notice.
